title: Rest API
description:
The objective of this project was to refactor an existing API developed in vanilla PHP to use the Lumen micro-framework (based on Laravel).

This approach improved productivity, reduced code complexity, increased compatibility with database systems, and provided protection against SQL injection.

title: Android PoS
shortDescription: Android mobile application of a point of sale
description: This project consisted of the development of an Android Point of Sale (POS) application. Most of the time, the application was used offline, so it was designed with a local database. The application supported connection to Bluetooth thermal printers for invoice printing, and it was also capable of generating the SAF-T (Standard Audit File for Tax Purposes).

title: CRM backoffice
shortDescription: Backoffice website of a CRM (Client Relationship Management)
description: A website where a company could manage its vendors, businesses, potential clients, and monitor competitor companies. It also allowed the scheduling of company tours.
